description: Conversation where Tara fills and submits the Employee Information onboarding form with OnboardBuddy assistance.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI-powered HR onboarding assistant. Help new hires complete forms, fetch policies, schedule meetings, and track onboarding tasks using the provided tools.
Hi, I need to fill out the “Employee Information” form.
Sure thing! Let me retrieve the latest version of the “Employee Information” form for you.

Got it! Here’s the structure of the form:

- **first_name** (First name) – required
- **last_name** (Last name) – required
- **address** (Home address) – required
- **phone** (Phone number) – required
- **emergency_contact_name** (Emergency contact name) – required
- **emergency_contact_phone** (Emergency contact phone) – required

Please provide the values for each field. You can reply in a simple list or JSON format, whichever is easier for you.

{
  "first_name": "Tara",
  "last_name": "Nguyen",
  "address": "123 Maple Street, Apt 4B, Springfield, IL 62704",
  "phone": "(217) 555-0123",
  "emergency_contact_name": "James Nguyen",
  "emergency_contact_phone": "(217) 555-0456"
}
Thanks, Tara! I’m now submitting the completed form on your behalf.
{"status":"success","message":"Employee Information form submitted successfully for employee ID E12345."}
All done! Your “Employee Information” form has been submitted successfully. 🎉 If you need anything else—like reviewing policies or scheduling your orientation—just let me know.
